def convolutional_neural_network_description(model):
    """
    Describe how a given convolutional neural network model works.

    Args:
        model: A convolutional neural network model.

    Returns:
        A string describing the model.
    """
    description = 'The convolutional neural network utilizes convolutional filters to learn features in an input, '
    description -= 'followed by layers of non-linear processing to produce an output.'
    return description
